title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 81 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 81 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Sing aloud unto God our strength: make a joyful noise unto the God of Jacob.
lineList.cn: （亚萨的诗，交与伶长，用迦特乐器）你们当向神我们的力量大声欢呼，向雅各的神发声欢乐，

lineList.en: Take a psalm, and bring hither the timbrel, the pleasant harp with the psaltery.
lineList.cn: 唱起诗歌，打手鼓，弹美琴与瑟。

lineList.en: Blow up the trumpet in the new moon, in the time appointed, on our solemn feast day.
lineList.cn: 当在月朔，并月望，我们过节的日期，吹角。

lineList.en: For this was a statute for Israel, and a law of the God of Jacob.
lineList.cn: 因这是为以色列定的律例，是雅各神的典章。

lineList.en: This he ordained in Joseph for a testimony, when he went out through the land of Egypt: where I heard a language that I understood not.
lineList.cn: 他去攻击埃及地的时候，在约瑟中间立此为证。我在那里听见我所不明白的言语。

lineList.en: I removed his shoulder from the burden: his hands were delivered from the pots.
lineList.cn: 神说，我使你的肩得脱重担，你的手放下筐子。

lineList.en: Thou calledst in trouble, and I delivered thee; I answered thee in the secret place of thunder: I proved thee at the waters of Meribah. Selah.
lineList.cn: 你在急难中呼求，我就搭救你。我在雷的隐密处应允你，在米利巴水那里试验你。（细拉）

lineList.en: Hear, O my people, and I will testify unto thee: O Israel, if thou wilt hearken unto me;
lineList.cn: 我的民哪，你当听。我要劝戒你。以色列阿，甚愿你肯听从我。

lineList.en: There shall no strange god be in thee; neither shalt thou worship any strange god.
lineList.cn: 在你当中不可有别的神。外邦的神，你也不可下拜。

lineList.en: I am the LORD thy God, which brought thee out of the land of Egypt: open thy mouth wide, and I will fill it.
lineList.cn: 我是耶和华你的神，曾把你从埃及地领上来。你要大大张口，我就给你充满。

lineList.en: But my people would not hearken to my voice; and Israel would none of me.
lineList.cn: 无奈我的民不听我的声音。以色列全不理我。

lineList.en: So I gave them up unto their own hearts' lust: and they walked in their own counsels.
lineList.cn: 我便任凭他们心里刚硬，随自己的计谋而行。

lineList.en: Oh that my people had hearkened unto me, and Israel had walked in my ways!
lineList.cn: 甚愿我的民肯听从我，以色列肯行我的道。

lineList.en: I should soon have subdued their enemies, and turned my hand against their adversaries.
lineList.cn: 我便速速治服他们的仇敌，反手攻击他们的敌人。

lineList.en: The haters of the LORD should have submitted themselves unto him: but their time should have endured for ever.
lineList.cn: 恨耶和华的人必来投降，但他的百姓，必永久长存。

lineList.en: He should have fed them also with the finest of the wheat: and with honey out of the rock should I have satisfied thee.
lineList.cn: 他也必拿上好的麦子给他们吃。有拿从磐石出的蜂蜜，叫他们饱足。
